resources.title: Staff: public servant assignment
resources.description:
Elaborated from a partnership with the central body of the Civil
Staff System of the Federal Administration (Sipec), which is the
Secretariat for Staff Management and Performance of the Ministry
of Economy, the Staff dimension presents a view of the realm of
public servants who comprise the workforce that is actually
available to perform the activities of public institutions that
comprise the [Federal Direct Autarchic and Foundational
Administration](https://raiox.economia.gov.br/static/raiox/docs/manual-de-estruturas-organizacionais_2edicao.pdf).

Public servants can, under certain conditions, be allocated to
work in other public agencies. this table presents the numbers
of servers assigned in the Federal Public Administration and
interns in each agency.

fields.description: Quantity of vacant positions (difference between `cargos_distribuidos` and `cargos_ocupados`).

resources.title: Staff: distributed and filled positions and functions
resources.description:
Produced by the central body of the System of Organization and
Institutional Innovation of the Federal Government (Siorg), the
Secretariat of Management of the Ministry of Economy, the
Positions and Functions section presents information and numbers
about the positions and commissioned functions from the Direct,
Autarchic and Foundational Administration. Data is disaggregated
by: occupancy rates; distribution by sex of the occupant; and
typology classifications positions and commissioned functions,
including technical functions.

According to item V of article 37 of the Federal Constitution of
1988, positions of trust are afforded to functions of direction,
leadership and advice. The functional positions are to be
exercised exclusively by servants who occupy a permanent
position, while the positions of trust are destined to be
occupied in a transitional basis by people whom the competent
authority entrusts to fill the role or to substitute it, even
though there are conditions and minimum percentages set in law
that must be filled in by career servants.

In accordance to the intention set forth in the introduction
text of the dashboard, as the X-Ray evolves, the idea is to
decompose the organizational structure in smaller levels and
to cross-reference them with those of other dimensions in the
dashboard, especially with ones about the work force. The idea
is to build more elaborated indicators which allow complimentary
analysis for a better understanding of the reality of the
Federal Government.

This table shows the quantities of positions distributed,
occupied and vacant in each agency or entity.

fields.name: sigla_codigo_cargo_comissao
fields.title: Acronym and code of the position of trust
fields.description: Acronym and Code of the Position of Trust, in the format of 2 or 3 letters followed by 4 digits, e.g. “DAS1014”, “FCP1014”, “FG 0002”, etc.

fields.name: denominacao_cargo_comissao
fields.title: Denomination of the position of trust
fields.description: Denomination of the position of trust or function, e.g.: “CHEFE” (BOSS), “COORDENADOR” (COORDINATOR), “ASSESSOR” (ADVISOR), etc.

fields.name: sexo
fields.title: Gender
fields.description: Gender of the workforce: **F** (feminine) or **M** (masculine)

fields.name: faixa_etaria
fields.title: Age group
fields.description:
Age group of the workforce, in one of the following ranges:

* 15 A 19 ANOS (15 TO 19 YEARS OLD)
* 20 A 24 ANOS (20 TO 24 YEARS OLD)
* 25 A 29 ANOS (25 TO 29 YEARS OLD)
* 30 A 34 ANOS (30 TO 34 YEARS OLD)
* 35 A 39 ANOS (35 TO 39 YEARS OLD)
* 40 A 44 ANOS (40 TO 44 YEARS OLD)
* 45 A 49 ANOS (45 TO 49 YEARS OLD)
* 50 A 54 ANOS (50 TO 54 YEARS OLD)
* 55 A 59 ANOS (55 TO 59 YEARS OLD)
* 60 A 64 ANOS (60 TO 64 YEARS OLD)
* 65 A 69 ANOS (65 TO 69 YEARS OLD)
* 70 ANOS OU MAIS (70 OR OLDER)

fields.name: escolaridade
fields.title: Education level
fields.description: Education level of the workforce (e.g. “**SUP COMPL OU HAB LEGAL EQV**” (GRADUATE LEVEL OR LEGAL EQUIVALENT), “**2O GR COMPL OU TEC PROFISS**” (COMPLETE HIGH SCHOOL OR PROFESSIONAL TECHNICIAN), “**DOUTORADO(T)**” (DOCTOR'S DEGREE), “**MESTRADO(T)**” (MASTER'S DEGREE), etc.)

fields.name: regime_juridico
fields.title: Legal regime
fields.description: Legal regime under which the workforce is hired (e.g. “**EST**” (STATUTORY REGIME), “**CDT**”, “**CLT**” (BRAZILIAN WORK CONSOLIDATION LAW), etc.)

fields.name: situacao_vinculo_servidor
fields.title: Servant bond situation
fields.description: Situation of the workforce bond, according to the rules of the SIAPE/SIGEPE system (e.g. “**ATIVO PERMANENTE**” (PERMANENT ACTIVE DUTY), “**CONT.PROF.SUBSTITUTO**” (DEPUTY PROFESSOR CONTRACT), “**NOMEADO CARGO COMIS.**” (APPOINTED TO POSITION OF TRUST), etc.)

fields.name: possui_vinculo
fields.title: Has bond
fields.description: indicator of whether or not the workforce has a bond to the FPA: **SEM VÍNCULO** (WITHOUT BOND) or **COM VÍNCULO** (WITH BOND)

fields.name: quantidade
fields.title: Quantity
fields.description: Quantity of Positions or Functions

resources.title: Staff: positions by profile
resources.description:
Produced by the very central body of the Federal Government
Institutional Organization and Innovation System (Siorg), which
is the Secretariat for Management of the Ministry of Economy,
the Positions section shows information and numbers about the
positions of trust in the Direct, Autarchic and Foundational
Administration. The data is disaggregated by: occupation
indices; distribution by gender of the occupant; and typology
classifications on the positions of trust, including technical
ones.

According to item V of article 37 of the Federal Constitution of
1988, positions of trust are afforded to functions of direction,
leadership and advice. The functional positions are to be
exercised exclusively by servants who occupy a permanent
position, while the positions of trust are destined to be
occupied in a transitional basis by people whom the competent
authority entrusts to fill the role or to substitute it, even
though there are conditions and minimum percentages set in law
that must be filled in by career servants.

In accordance to the intention set forth in the introduction
text of the dashboard, as the X-Ray evolves, the idea is to
decompose the organizational structure in smaller levels and
to cross-reference them with those of other dimensions in the
dashboard, especially with ones about the work force. The idea
is to build more elaborated indicators which allow complimentary
analysis for a better understanding of the reality of the
Federal Government.

resources.title: Administrative defrayal
resources.description:
The Administrative Defrayal section shows data regarding to the
expenses that bring the necessary support to the effective
delivery to society of goods and services, comprising the basis
for the supply of public services.

Thus, the administrative costs data aims to measure what has
been traditionally called "middle area", and comprises the
expenses related to consumable materials, real estate rentals,
electric power and water, support services, among many others.
The complete roster and the methodological note can be found on
the webpage of the [Administrative Costs
Bulletin](https://www.gov.br/economia/pt-br/centrais-de-conteudo/publicacoes/boletins/boletim-de-custeio-administrativo).

The classification of the expenses with administrative costs
follows the Accounting Plan Applied to the Public Sector –
PCASP (in the Portuguese acronym), elaborated by the Secretariat
of the National Treasury – STN, and corresponds to the most
representative expenditure sub-elements found and selected by
the Secretariat of the Federal Budget – SOF based upon analysis
of the opening of Federal Public Expenses by Expenditure Nature
in its greatest level of detail.

Because of the intrinsic nature of the Federal Public Budget,
data is always related to the actual realized expenditures.
Therefore, it is important to note that, although the available
data is disaggregated by month, there will be cases where the
service delivery contracts in this section are awarded annually.
That may explain, at least partially, variations in the
amplitude of monthly spending.

The data available in this section is extracted from the
Integrated System for Financial Management of the Federal
Government – SIAFI (in the Portuguese acronym), and consolidated
by the Secretariat of the Federal Budget – SOF.

The concepts of financial programming components, such as the
Expenditure Nature, can be found on the [Technical Guide of the
Budget](https://www1.siop.planejamento.gov.br/mto/doku.php/mto2020:cap4#componentes_da_programacao_financeira).

resources.title: Primary Budget
resources.description:
Conceived in partnership with the Secretariat of the Federal
Budget of the Ministry of Economy, the Primary Budget section
presents a partial view of the budget execution values, with a
slice focused on: non-financial expenditures (Primary Result
Indicator – RP different from 0); and expenditures forecasted
in the Fiscal Budget and in the Social Security Budget.

Besides the fact that the scope comprises only the bodies of the
[Direct, Autarchic and Foundational Administration(https://raiox.economia.gov.br/static/raiox/docs/manual-de-estruturas-organizacionais_2edicao.pdf),
this is a perspective that has been used in the institutional
transformation initiatives since the last Government Transition
process. In that occasion, the slice was presented by means of
the Government Transition Dashboard, where the X-Ray has
inherited its concepts from. In general, the focus is on those
items that offer to the manager a greater management capacity,
where their actions are capable of generating impact.

Among other details contained in the support items and
materials, it stands out that the budgets of their own and
investments of the non-dependent state companies have not been
included, as well as expenses with interests, charges,
amortization and debt refinancing. Some cross budgets were
removed and the budget of some Budget Actions related to the
management and application of funds and budget transfers were
also excluded.

The concepts and components of the financial programming, such
as the Expenditure Nature, can be found in the [Technical Guide
of the Budget](https://www1.siop.planejamento.gov.br/mto/doku.php/mto2020:cap4#componentes_da_programacao_financeira).

resources.title: Union Property
resources.description:
The segment of data of the Union equity, represented here,
comes from a collaboration with the Secretariat for Coordination and
Governance of Union Property, which is an area of ​​the Ministry of
Economy who is responsible for managing the real estate assets of the
Union.

This section is intended to demonstrate, through indicators and
graphics, quantitative and qualitative data of the real estate 
properties in use by the Union, that are intended for the execution of
administrative services or the provision of public services in
general, such as public office buildings.

The data presented does not include the so-called private properties
— which are not occupied by the Public Administration — but
assigned to third parties through land regularization instruments
, such as tenures, Real Rights Concessions of
Use (CDRU), and Special Use Concession for Housing purposes
(CUEM). The data presented does not include goods in common use
of the people — those necessary for the community, for example,
rivers, squares, public roads and beaches.

resources.title: Staff: workforce
resources.description:
Elaborated from a partnership with the central body of the Civil
Staff System of the Federal Administration (Sipec), which is
the Secretariat for Staff Management and Performance of the
Ministry of Economy, the Staff dimension presents a view of
the realm of public servants who comprise the workforce that is
actually available to perform the activities of public
institutions that comprise the [Federal Direct Autarchic and
Foundational Administration](https://raiox.economia.gov.br/static/raiox/docs/manual-de-estruturas-organizacionais_2edicao.pdf).

This section presents an overview of the staff in active duty in
the public bodies and entities, including a wide perspective of
the workforce, with its characteristics: by gender; by age
group; by education level; and by the positions and careers of
the permanent staff. Among the most important concepts to this
section, the workforce is meant to be considered the permanent
and commissioned servants, with and without permanent ties to
the Administration, including professionals hired for a
determined time frame (temporary staff), which are effectively
in duty on the body or entity.

This version does not include some details of the workforce of
the Central Bank of Brazil, which are being incorporated,
information on the staff of the Brazilian Intelligence Agency
(ABIN), and the military staff of the Armed Forces. The realm of
state owned companies, the governance of which is coordinated by
the Secretariat for Coordination and Governance of State
Companies - SEST, is also not included. This information is
published by the [Overview of the State
Companies](http://www.panoramadasestatais.planejamento.gov.br/QvAJAXZfc/opendoc.htm?document=paineldopanoramadasestatais.qvw&lang=en-US&host=QVS@srvbsaiasprd07&anonymous=true)
and the [State Companies
Bulletin](https://raiox.economia.gov.br/static/raiox/docs/12a-edicao-boletim-das-empresas-estatais-federais.pdf).

fields.name: orgao_superior_codigo_siorg
fields.title: SIORG Code of the Superior Body

fields.name: orgao_superior_nome
fields.title: Full name of the Superior Body

fields.name: orgao_codigo_siorg
fields.title: SIORG Code of the Public Body

fields.name: orgao_nome
fields.title: Full name of the Public Body

fields.name: orgao_como_no_raiox_nome
fields.title: Name of the Public Body in the X-Ray
fields.description: Name of the Public Body, the way it appears consolidated in the X-Ray

fields.name: orgao_como_no_raiox_sigla
fields.title: Acronym of the Public Body in the X-Ray
fields.description: Acronym of the Public Body, the way it appears consolidated in the X-Ray

fields.name: ano_mes_referencia
fields.title: Year/month of reference
fields.description: Year/month in the format **YYYYMM** of reference for the extracted data

fields.name: possui_protocolo_integrado
fields.title: Has Integrated Filing
fields.description: Whether or not the Body has (SIM/NÃO) (YES/NO) interoperability among the different filing systems used to record the transfer of documents with the Integrated Filing System.

fields.name: possui_processo_eletronico
fields.title: Has electronic case file
fields.description: Whether or not the Body has (SIM/NÃO) (YES/NO) a system for managing electronic case files and documents (e.g. SEI, SIPAC, SIGA, SAPIENS or another).

fields.name: integra_barramento_pen
fields.title: Integrates the PEN Bus
fields.description: Whether or not the Body has (SIM/NÃO) (YES/NO) a deployed bus of the National Electronic Case File, which is a centralized infrastructure to send digital case files or administrative documents to another body in a secure manner and with reliable delivery.

fields.name: utiliza_taxigov
fields.title: Uses Taxi Gov
fields.description: Whether or not the Body has adhered to (SIM/NÃO) (YES/NO) using TaxiGov, a model which replaced the rental and owned vehicles for other forms of transportation of servants and collaborators in work transfers.

fields.name: utiliza_almoxarifado_virtual
fields.title: Uses the Virtual Warehouse
fields.description: Whether or not the Body uses the Virtual Warehouse (SIM/NÃO) (YES/NO). The service is based upon the acquisition of office consumable materials though the technological platform.

fields.name: integra_rede_mais_brasil
fields.title: Integrates the +Brazil Network
fields.description: Whether or not the Body has joined the +Brazil Network, which is the network of collaborative governance that aims to promote a greater integration among the stakeholders in the cycle of public fund transfers (SIM/NÃO) (YES/NO).

fields.name: aderiu_transforma_gov
fields.title: Has adhered to TransformaGov
fields.description: Whether or not the Body has adhered to (SIM/NÃO) (YES/NO) the Strategic Management and State Transformation Program (TransformaGov). The program, targeted to the direct autarchic and foundational public administration, except for Federal Education Institutions, comprises new institutional arrangements and organizational efficiency measures.

fields.name: publica_pei
fields.title: Publishes PEI
fields.description: Whether or not the Body publishes (SIM/NÃO) (YES/NO) its Institutional Strategic Plan - PEI (in the Portuguese acronym), which is an instrument to determine its main objectives, the policies and strategies that shall govern it, the use and availability of resources, the establishment of objectives, strategies, goals, actions and values, in order to demand the deployment of resources and priority setting.

fields.name: integra_pag_terouro
fields.title: Integrates PagTesouro
fields.description: Whether or not the Body uses (SIM/NÃO) (YES/NO) PagTesouro in its services, which is the government's payments platform.

resources.title: Modernization solutions
resources.description:
Under modernization solutions, information is organized about the
adhesion and use of shared services and other initiatives leaning
towards institutional innovation, process optimization, cost
reduction and the increase of transparency in the Federal Public
Administration. This monitoring shows the situation of adhesion
and use by bodies and entities of the Direct, Autarchic and
Foundational Administration. Here is presented data about the
going of some of the solutions offered by the Secretariat for
Management, under coordination of the Special Secretariat for
De-bureaucratization, Management and Digital Government. A lot
more information about shared services, systems, apps and
digital platforms can be found on the Catalog of Solutions.

On this dashboard, information is presented about the adherence
to the TransformaGov Program and to the +BRAZIL Network, about
the use of new service models such as TaxiGov and Virtual
Warehouse. Furthermore, it's also possible to monitor the
adherence of bodies and entities to the National Electronic
Case File (PEN, in the Portuguese acronym), with comprises
basically the deployment of a Electronic Case File System, the
coupling of that system to the PEN Bus which makes it possible
to transfer case files between bodies and entities by digital
means and, finally, the availability of information about these
transfers in the Integrated Filing Portal.

fields.title: Name of the Public Body in the X-Ray

fields.name: orgao_como_no_raiox_sigla
fields.title: Acronym of the Public Body in the X-Ray

fields.title: Year/month of reference
fields.description: Year/month in the format **YYYYMM** of reference for the extracted data

fields.name: area
fields.title: Area
fields.description: Thematic area of the service

fields.name: servico
fields.title: Service
fields.description: Name of the service

fields.name: situacao
fields.title: Situation
fields.description: The service's situation in regards to its digital transformation according to the Secretariat for Digital Government's control: '**Digital**', '**Prospecção**' (under prospecting), '**Transformado**' (transformed), '**Pactuado**' (agreed upon), '**Implantação**' (deployment), '**Automação**' (being automated), '**Preparação**' (under preparation) or '**Não digital**' (non-digital).

fields.name: situacao_raiox
fields.title: Situation in the X-Ray
fields.description: Situation of the service in regards to its digital transformation, as shown in the X-Ray dashboard: '**Digitalizado**' (digitized), **Digitalização não iniciada**' (digitization not started) or '**Em digitalização***' (under digitization).

fields.name: integracao_pagtesouro
fields.title: Integration with PagTesouro
fields.description: The service's situation in regards to its integration with PagTesouro: ‘**Integrado**’ (integrated), ‘**Pactuação**’ (under agreement), or blank.

fields.name: valor_percentual_etapas_digitais
fields.title: Percentage of digital stages
fields.description: Percentage, varying from 0 to 1, of the amount of stages of the service which are digital, in relation to the total quantity of stages of the service.

fields.name: valor_economia_potencial_governo
fields.title: Potential savings to the government
fields.description: Potential savings to the government with the digitization of the service, in Brazilian Real.

fields.name: valor_economia_potencial_sociedade
fields.title: Economia potencial para a sociedade
fields.description: Potential savings to the society with the digitization of the service, in Brazilian Real.

fields.name: quantidade_beneficiados_ano
fields.title: Amount of beneficiaries by year
fields.description: Amount of people benefited by the service, by year.

fields.name: valor_economia_anual_governo
fields.title: Annual savings to the government
fields.description: Actual savings to the government with the digitization of the service, in Brazilian Real, by year.

fields.name: valor_economia_anual_sociedade
fields.title: Annual savings to society
fields.description: Actual savings to society with the digitization of the service, in Brazilian Real, by year.

fields.name: valor_investimento
fields.title: Investment value
fields.description: Investment value of the service digitization

fields.name: previsao_entrega_trimestre
fields.title: Forecast of delivery (quarter)
fields.description: Forecast of the quarter in which the service digitization will be delivered, in quarter number, counting from the first quarter of 2019, which receives the value 1, incremented at each quarter thereafter. This applies only to services with the following situations: Pactuado (agreed upon), Preparação (under preparation), Automação (under automation), Implantação (deployment) and Transformado (transformed).

resources.title: Digital transformation
resources.description:
Through the Digital Transformation Plans agreed upon by the
public bodies and entities with the Secretariat for Digital
Government of the Ministry of Economy, this section presents a
summary of the government's efforts in the scope of the digital
transformation strategy, with the objective of simplifying the
monitoring, evaluation and, most importantly, access of
citizens to the public services.

Here the services are presented according to their stage in the
digitization process (whether it's not been stared, underway or
finished); the organization by thematic area; by body or entity;
and the number of beneficiaries, in addition to the potential
economy attained with the digitization of said services.

The monitoring of these actions, under the responsibility of the
Special Secretariat for De-bureaucratization, Management and
Digital Government of the Ministry of Economy, is made by means
of the Digital Transformation Plans, in which the goals are
agreed upon with the public bodies of the Direct, Autarchic and
Foundational Administration.

name: raio-x-da-administracao-publica-federal-2021-10
title: X-Ray of the Federal Public Administration (October/2021)
description:
The X-Ray of the Federal Public Administration is a management tool
being developed by the Special Secretariat for De-bureaucratization
Management and Digital Government of the Ministry of Economy. Its
objective is to foster the monitoring of public management, its
improvement using data and information, and to strengthen the
Structuring Systems of the Federal Government.

The dashboard consolidates a dataset about:

* the Primary Budget;
* the composition and characteristics of Staff;
* the structure of Positions and Functions;
* the evolution of the Digital Transformation process;
* the adhesion of institutions to the Modernization Solutions;
* information about the Union's Property and the monitoring
  of Administrative Defrayal expenditures.

In addition to visualizing data on the dashboard, it's also possible
to download and use as open data all the information contained
therein. That makes possible other kinds of analysis, which have not
been previously foreseen in the dashboard visualizations, and to
cross-reference the data with other sources.

## Table Layouts

The available data is organized as files in CSV (comma separated
values) files that can be opened in any spreadsheet editor. The data
is grouped at the smallest possible level of aggregation, except
with de-aggregating it would expose personal data. It follows a
dimensional structure i.e. there are columns representing dimensions
and metrics. The amount of lines in each table depends on the
quantity of dimensions used. The columns containing metrics can be
consolidated by respecting the same initial rule. For example, on
the table `pessoal-forca-trabalho.csv` table we could calculate the
total quantity of the work force by just summing up all of the
values in the `quantidade_forca_trabalho` column. On the other hand,
to calculate the total average of wages, it is necessary to make a
weighted average of the `remuneracao_media` field, weighted with the
`quantidade_forca_trabalho` field. All tables have the following
fields: `orgao_superior_codigo_siorg`,
`orgao_superior_nome`, `orgao_superior_sigla`, `orgao_codigo_siorg`,
`orgao_nome`, `orgao_sigla`, `orgao_como_no_raiox_nome`,
`orgao_como_no_raiox_sigla` and `ano_mes_referencia`. These fields
refer to the public body, its superior body (eg.: FUNAI is bound to
MJSP) and the year/month of the extracted data.

The `orgao_como_no_raiox_nome` and `orgao_como_no_raiox_sigla`
fields refer to the way they are consolidated in the X-Ray of the
Federal Public Administration dashboard. In it, some bodies do
appear consolidated together with the superior hierarchical level.
For example, data from the Civil House of the Presidency of the
Republic appear consolidated together with the Presidency of the
Republic. In open data, we've decided to convey the data in a more
disaggregated way, in order to make more analysis possible. However,
so that the information may coincide with the dashboard, the body
must be considered as represented in this field.

contributors.title: General Coordination of Information Management at SEGES

sources.title: X-Ray of the Federal Public Administration
